course_title: Special Topics in Psychology: Humans of Tomorrow
class_notes: Prior completion of PSYC 110 and PSYC 111 and QTM 100 and a course in [PSYC 200 plus level or NBB 200 plus level]. Permission of the instructor is required for enrollment. For permission, e-mail Dr. Kelly at aubrey.kelly@emory.edu with relevant courses you have taken in PSYC, NBB, PHIL, and Computer Science.
course_description: A series of special topics of concern to the discipline of psychology. Content will vary in successive offerings. May be repeated for credit when topic varies.
schedule_location: MW 11:30am-12:45pm in New Psyc Bldg 393 (36 Eagle Ro
